effect_entries.effect:
For five turns, the user is immune to ground moves.

If the user is under the effect of ingrain or has levitate, this move will fail.

This effect is temporarily disabled by and cannot be used during gravity.

This effect is passed on by baton pass.
effect_entries.short_effect: User is immune to Ground moves and effects for five turns.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
The user levitates
using electrically
generated magnetism
for five turns.

The user levitates
using electrically
generated magnetism
for five turns.

The user levitates
using electrically
generated magnetism
for five turns.

Le lanceur utilise l’électricité pour
générer un champ magnétique
et léviter durant 5 tours.

The user levitates using electrically
generated magnetism for five turns.

The user levitates using electrically
generated magnetism for five turns.

でんきで　つくった　じりょくの　ちからで
ちゅうに　うかぶ。
５ターンの　あいだ　ふゆう　できる。

전기로 만든 자력의 힘으로
허공에 뜬다.
5턴 동안 부유할 수 있다.

Le lanceur utilise l’électricité pour générer un
champ magnétique et léviter durant cinq tours.

Anwender schwebt für fünf Runden
durch elektrisch erzeugten Magnetismus.

Levita gracias a un campo magnético generado por
electricidad durante cinco turnos.

Chi la usa si solleva in aria per cinque turni
grazie a un campo elettromagnetico.

The user levitates using electrically
generated magnetism for five turns.

電気で　つくった　磁力の　力で
宙に　浮かぶ。
５ターンの　あいだ　浮遊できる。
